name: b.tan Darker Self Tanner Kit | Fall In Love at First Tan Bundle - Darker Self Tan Mousse with Self Tanning Mitt Applicator, Violet Base, 1 Hour Sunless Fast Tanner, No Fake Tan Smell, No Added Nasties, Vegan, Cruelty Free, 6.7 Fl Oz

other_info.Skin Type: All, Oily, Combination, Sensitive, Dry, Normal
other_info.Product Benefits: Hydrating, Radiant Tan, Color Correction, Moisturizing

about_this_item: NO ORANGE TONES. i'm perfect for anyone looking for a medium dark tan with absolutely no orange tones
TANNING MITT INCLUDED. i come with our best selling mitt so you can create the most awesome, dark tan on the planet
1 HOUR CURE TIME. 1 hour development time, leave on for 4+ hours for darker results
PRO TIP: apply a moisturizer to elbows, knees + ankles before application. apply evenly (but not too thick) + blend thoroughly for the perfect bronzed glow. use with a mitt for ultra smooth results.
VEGAN FRIENDLY. i love animals so im 100% cruelty free, vegan friendly, and free of nasties like parabens
MADE IN THE USA: Made by the tanning experts here in the USA. Our state of the art production facilities use only the highest quality ingredients so you know your skin is well looked after.
